featuredCategories.description: Corsair Vengeance LPX DDR4 DRAM is designed for high-performance overclocking. The heatspreader is made of pure aluminum for faster heat dissipation, and the eight-layer PCB helps manage heat and provides superior overclocking headroom.

reviews.comment: Great RAM, but a bit expensive.
Excellent performance and looks great too!

featuredCategories.description: Crucial Ballistix DDR4 DRAM delivers blazing fast speeds and low latencies for an enhanced gaming and content creation experience. It features an integrated heat spreader to maximize thermal performance and a custom-designed PCB for increased signal quality and stability.

reviews.comment: Outstanding performance. Highly recommended!
Fast delivery and excellent customer service.

featuredCategories.description: G.Skill Ripjaws V DDR4 DRAM offers outstanding performance and compatibility. It features a sleek, asymmetrical design and is optimized for high-speed overclocking.

reviews.comment: The best RAM I've ever used. Absolutely love it!

featuredCategories.description: Kingston HyperX Fury DDR4 offers a cost-effective upgrade option with high-quality performance. It features a stylish, low-profile design that complements most systems.

reviews.comment: Good value for money. Performs well in gaming.

featuredCategories.description: The Corsair RM750x is a high-performance power supply unit designed for gaming and high-end systems. It delivers 750W of continuous power with 80+ Gold efficiency, ensuring stable and reliable performance.

reviews.comment: Outstanding power supply. Highly recommended!

featuredCategories.description: The ASUS TUF Gaming VG279QM is a 27-inch Full HD gaming monitor with a high refresh rate of 280Hz, making it perfect for competitive gaming. It features an IPS panel for accurate colors and AMD FreeSync Premium technology for smooth gameplay.
